name: Từ vựng Tiếng Anh hoạt động đi làm/đi học (Work/School Activities)

words.example: Every morning, I go to work at 8 AM.

words.vietnamese: Đi làm/đi học (hàng ngày, quãng đường xa)
words.example: Many people commute long distances to their jobs.
I need to work hard to finish this project, and then I will study for my exam.
We will have a meeting to discuss the new proposal.
Let's take a break for ten minutes.
I usually have lunch around noon.
I always feel relieved when I finish work for the day.
After a long day, I just want to go home.
